backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing chat messaging, user profiles, video categories, market trends, and access control with role-based permissions for users and admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five optimization features including ChatPage virtualization, AnimatedBackground performance improvements, VideoLearningPage lazy loading, floating AI assistant button, and React.memo optimizations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose, optimizations, and key features including memoization, lazy loading, and performance enhancements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for JengaBiz Assistant application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, ThemeProvider, and Toaster for global state management and authentication.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedBackgrou: Performance-optimized canvas-based animated gradient background with device capability detection, adaptive layer count, frame rate throttling (30/60 FPS), and reduced motion support.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessage.tsx: Memoized chat message component with custom comparison function to prevent unnecessary re-renders, displaying user/assistant messages with glassmorphic styling and animations.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Memoized footer component with WhatsApp and USSD integration, service availability checking, authentication-gated USSD requests, and useCallback-optimized event handlers.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with theme toggle, user profile dropdown, and logout functionality. Displays JengaBiz logo and integrates with Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Modal dialog for Internet Identity authentication with loading states. Prevents dismissal and displays JengaBiz branding during login flow.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first-time user profile creation requiring a name input. Prevents dismissal until profile is saved successfully.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeScreen.ts: Landing page component displaying JengaBiz mission, vision, and motivation cards with animated hero section. Content appears truncated in the provided source.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication. Automatically invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication managing login state, identity storage, and AuthClient lifecycle. Provides login, logout, and status tracking functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend data operations including user profiles, market data, and video content. Includes curated TED video data for business and entrepreneurship topics.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, defining a vibrant entrepreneurship-themed color palette (orange-gold primary, teal accent) and glassmorphism utilities including animations, gradients, and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/lib/aiResponses.ts: AI response generator that detects language (English/Swahili) and provides contextual business advice based on keyword matching, with templates covering topics like budgeting, pricing, marketing, and financial planning.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page showcasing JengaBiz mission, vision, impact areas, and value propositions with animated cards, statistics, and glassmorphism design elements highlighting business mentorship and AI-powered guidance.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat interface component managing message state with localStorage persistence, featuring auto-scroll, debounced message sending, lazy-loaded animated background, and integration with AI response generation.
frontend/src/pages/MainApp.tsx: Main application shell with tab navigation (Chat, Market Analysis, Video Learning, About), authentication flow handling via Internet Identity, profile setup modal, and floating AI assistant button with animated background.
frontend/src/pages/MarketAnalysisPage.ts: Market analysis dashboard page displaying growth trends and sector data using recharts, with refresh functionality and memoized chart data to prevent unnecessary recalculations.
frontend/src/pages/VideoLearningPage.tsx: Video learning page with paginated video grid, lazy-loaded thumbnails, memoized VideoCard components, and dialog player for TED/YouTube content.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme tokens for sidebar/chart colors, and custom animations for accordions.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing existing performance optimization features (virtualization, memoization, lazy loading) and pending feature requests for AI button visibility and app performance improvements.
